title: About Commerd
subtitle: Our story, mission, and the passionate team behind our innovative solutions

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Commerd, we believe in the power of innovation to transform Thai ecommerce businesses. Our mission is to provide world-class SEO, CRO, design, and business intelligence solutions that help Thai companies achieve sustainable growth in the digital marketplace.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded with a vision to bridge Scandinavian design excellence with Thai market expertise, Commerd has been at the forefront of ecommerce transformation. We combine deep industry experience from jewelry, pharmaceuticals, and banking with innovative thinking to deliver solutions that make a real difference for small and medium-sized Thai businesses.

items.title: Scandinavian Design Excellence
items.description: We bring clean, functional design principles that convert visitors into customers

items.title: Thai Market Expertise
items.description: Deep understanding of Thai consumer behavior and local business practices

items.title: Industry Experience
items.description: Proven results across diverse sectors including jewelry, pharmaceuticals, and banking

items.title: Data-Driven Growth
items.description: Advanced SEO, CRO, and business intelligence for measurable results

items.title: Client Success
items.description: We are committed to delivering the best standards and results for our clients

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced professionals with diverse backgrounds in ecommerce and business consulting

cta.title: Ready to Work Together?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can help transform your business.
